title: Xayah Gifting ?
body:
So I just came back after like 5 months of being away and I just saw that people are gifting xayah and this other champion. So how does that work and I see a lot of people asking for the champions ?
 I mean are we actually becoming kind to each other ? 
When I started no one wanted to gift anything :') makes me happy that the player base has become more grown up. 
Hopefully I can see you guys in the game . I don't have the 6300ip or 7800ip to gift to anyone I myself don't have the champions but I guess I have to work hard to earn my ip and get those 2 champs.

Well I'll be seeing you on the summoners rift  ;) hopefully these changes will make the game more interactive.
Add me my ign is SKT T1 Madafaker 



{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
